subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: The Spanish cyclist Pedro Horrillo was in serious condition at a local hospital after crashing over a guardrail during the eighth stage of the Giro d’Italia.
snippet: The Spanish cyclist Pedro Horrillo was in serious condition at a local hospital after crashing over a guardrail during the eighth stage of the Giro d’Italia.
